home.cta.title: Ready to launch your project with Swell?
home.cta.description: Get started quickly with Swell, designed to simplify development and let you focus on what matters.
home.faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
home.faq.q1: What is the Swell starter kit?
home.faq.a1: Swell is a complete, ready-to-use e-commerce starter kit designed to accelerate the development of your web projects.
home.faq.q2: Who is this starter kit for?
home.faq.a2: It's designed for developers who want to quickly start a modern e-commerce project with a solid technical foundation.
home.faq.q3: What frameworks and technologies are used?
home.faq.a3: The starter kit uses Laravel for the backend, React and TypeScript for the frontend, and Tailwind CSS and Shadcn UI for the interface.
home.faq.q4: Can I customize the components and structure?
home.faq.a4: Yes, all components and project structure are fully customizable to fit your needs.
home.faq.q5: Does the kit include product pages and more?
home.faq.a5: Yes, pages are provided directly to help you get started quickly.
home.faq.q6: How can I get help or contribute to the project?
home.faq.a6: You can check the documentation, join the discussion on GitHub, or submit contributions directly to the repository.
home.footer.description: A simple and flexible starter-kit to jumpstart your e-commerce projects.
home.footer.copyright: © {{year}} Swell. Built with Laravel. Contributions welcome.
